description:
Just in time, who appears before the captured Lucy? Gray and Erza! Gajeel`s Dragon Slayer Magic somehow resurrected them from the giant lacrima! But then, an epic battle breaks out between the two Erzas. Meanwhile, King Faust has a truly sinister plan for the magic power he extracted from Natsu and Wendy...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: エルザ vs. エルザ
